titles: A discourse and defence of arms and armory, shewing the nature and rises of arms and honour in England, from the camp, the court, the city: under the two later of which, are contained universities and inns of court. / By Edward Waterhous Esq;.
author: Waterhouse, Edward, 1619-1670.
publisher: Printed by T.R. for Samuel Mearne in Little Britain,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Military ceremonies, honors, and salutes --  Early works to 1800.
